channel.title: Shadowrun Catalog Changelog
channel.description: Changelog (Version History) for Shadowrun Catalog, containing all recent changes.

item.title: Version 1.0.0 "Sliver Angel"
item.description:
This release contain the first full fledged version of the Shadowrun Catalog. It contains most of the materials from editions 1 to 6.

Included in this release are support for the folowing features:

  • Search materials by title, publisher, date published, SKU, type (book, magazine, etc.), edition (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, and 6th).
  • View, edit, add and remove materials on the local list
  • Load a collaction from a folder that is auto-mapped to the materials on the local list
